custom_fields.label: Selection
custom_fields.name: Employee Referral-custom_selection
custom_fields.options:
Selected
Rejected
On Hold
Future Requirement

custom_fields.depends_on:
eval: (
        (frappe.user.has_role('HR HOD') ||
        frappe.user.has_role('HR Manager') || 
        frappe.user.has_role('HR User')
    ) && 
        (doc.workflow_state == 'Sent to Recruiter' || 
        doc.workflow_state == 'Approved by Recruiter' || 
        doc.workflow_state == 'Rejected by Recruiter')
    )
custom_fields.label: HR Review
custom_fields.name: Employee Referral-custom_hr_review
